info.name: Daft's Dark PokeMMO Theme (90% finished)
info.description:
VERY IMPORTANT NOTE, ACTUALLY READ THIS: 
It should be mentioned that this style is not fully complete.  It's functional, and with general browsing the missing stuff won't really be noticeable, but there are things(Player profiles come to mind) that have some missing elements.
I haven't had the chance to test this across multiple browsers and computers, so there may be some issues.    
If there's a bug, report it by sending me a message here: https://forums.pokemmo.eu/index.php?/user/51351-daftkitteh/

This also may or may not work on chrome.  If it doesn't, I'll work on making it work on chrome.
info.additionalInfo:
Another note: This is really poorly commented, so if you're interested in changing the colors, I'd recommend just using the "find and replace" tool in a text editor.  Most of the colors can be found at the top/bottom of the CSS in comments, but it's easier to figure out which color is which with a color selection tool(I used gpick). 
There are also some unfinished parts(Player profiles come to mind) that I'd like to work on, but haven't gotten around to it yet.  

Feel free to edit and distribute this style, however I would really like it if you'd give credit to me (Via linking my PokeMMO profile or here in your style) if you use my style.  Obviously I can't force anyone to though, and I'm not gonna put any restrictive license on this. 

High Priority: 
Create a custom 'Like' button image that goes with the theme. 

To Do List: 
Finish player profiles 
Create my own icons (Very far from doing this) 
Clean up the code, it's fucking atrocious 
Allow for easy changing of colors with the use of variables at the top of the CSS
 
Unfinished Areas: 
Player Profiles 
New Topic Creation 
View New Content (Really needs work)
Warning Points
